actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Natural Gas Act to provide for a 5-year suspension of regulation of the sale for resale of natural gas in the interstate market, and to provide that intrastate pipelines and producers may negotiate short-term sales of natural gas to interstate pipelines for a period not to exceed 180 days.

summary.text: Provides, under the Natural Gas Act, for a five-year suspension of regulation of the sale for resale of natural gas in the interstate market. Provides that intrastate pipelines and producers may negotiate short-term sales of natural gas to interstate pipelines for a period not to exceed 180 days.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Natural Gas Act to provide for a 5-year suspension of regulation of the sale for resale of natural gas in the interstate market, and to provide that intrastate pipelines and producers may negotiate short-term sales of natural gas to interstate pipelines for a period not to exceed 180 days.
